snippet.title: Best Nintendo DS Strategy Game - Kunitori Zunou Battle Review
snippet.description:
Outside of Japan, Kunitori Zunou Battle is pretty unknown.
However, it's one of the best Nintendo DS games ever made.
If you like playing board games, this is the game to play as it is basically a digital board game.
There is a multiplayer mode in which up to 4 players can play together and it is the only title from the Nobunaga's Ambition series that presents a great multiplayer experience.
If you are a fan of the Sengoku Jidai(Sengoku period, Feudal Japan) it is a must play title as you battle against big names such as Oda Nobunaga, Takeda Shingen, Uesugi Kenshin and Date Masamune.
Feel free to leave a comment if you have any questions regarding the gameplay.

Ever since I met the story of Oda Nobunaga, I became a huge fan of the Sengoku jidai(Sengoku Period, Feudal Japan).
I have played a lot of Sengoku jidai games and am reviewing the best games I found.
Through these videos not only do I review games but also introduce the major historical figures and events of the Sengoku jidai.

If you're a fan or interested in the Japan Sengoku jidai, make sure to subscribe as more Sengoku game reviews are coming up!

#NDS #Nintendo #GameReview #Rare
